## Section title

This is a mini [quarto](https://quarto.org/) document with text and some R code.  

- in Rstudio, click "Render" at the top
- in VScode, click the Preview button (topright)

This will execute the R code and weave together the text, code and output.

In Rstudio, I recommend to set (Cog symbol) Preview in Viewer Pane.

```{r, plot_example, echo=TRUE}
pairs(iris[, 1:4], main="Anderson's Iris Data",
      col=c("orange", "salmon", "lightblue")[unclass(iris$Species)], 
	  pch=16, cex=1.5, lower.panel=NULL, las=1)

```

More in lesson I1.5, specifically the homework, where we'll also mix in Python code :)
